europeana:record.dc:title: Results of the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition to Ambon (1990) Part. 4. The Holothurioidea (Echinodermata) collected at Ambon during the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Massin C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Holothurioidea; Ambon; taxonomy; new species.
europeana:record.dc:description: During the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition (4.xi-14.xii.l990) 52 specimens representing 27 holothurian species were collected. All the species are described, figured and discussed systematically. Six species are new to the fauna of Ambon; two of these are new to the fauna of Indonesia, and two are new species: Afrocucumis stracki and Chiridota smirnovi. The holothurian fauna of Ambon is now represented by 59 species.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Results of the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition to Ambon (1990) Part. 4. The Holothurioidea (Echinodermata) collected at Ambon during the Rumphius Biohistorical Expedition (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 307) (Issue 1)
